resources.string:
This app will help you learn the article of some nouns based on their ending.

 Not all German nouns must be learned together with the article. Based on their ending, you can get the right article: 

 Der: ending in -eur, -ant, -ent, -ar, -är, -ismus, -ist, -ast, -ig, -ling, -or, -us;
 60% of the words ending in -el/-er
 80% of the words ending in -en
 Days, months, seasons


Die: ending in -a, -anz, -enz, -ei, -ie, -ik, -in, -heit, -keit, -schaft, -tät, -sion, -tion, -ion, -und, -ung, -ur, -itis, -age;
 90% of the words ending in -e
 Most flowers and fruits


Das: ending in -chen, -lein, -le, -sel, -tel, -tum, -um, -ma, -ment;
 90% nouns with prefix Ge-
 2/3 of nouns with -nis, -sal
 Verb infinitives used as nouns

Select the article from the options given. Each time you select an answer, you advance to the next question.\n\nYou can return to the title screen using up or back from within the game screen, and this will also end your game.
I mastered the German articles with %1$d/%2$d correct questions!
Number of correct answers: %2$d \n Number of questions: %1$d
Number of correct answers: %2$d \n Number of questions: %1$d \n A star among stars!
